item.description: You will be joining a regular JP Cohousing potluck brunch. Just bring a little something to share, have some coffee or tea, and let's get to know each other. We will answer any question you may have about cohousing in general or JP Cohousing in particular, then take you for a tour of our Common House which includes the kid's room, living room, Great Room, kitchen, mailroom, offices, rumpus room, laundry, and guest suite. The gathering will wrap up at noon. (You can visit our website at http://www.jpcohousin...)
item.how_to_find_us: Please come directly to the Common House which is the big building you see across the interior yard when you first come in the Cornwall Street entrance. Come in through the vestibule and turn left into our Great Room.
item.why: Whether you are new to cohousing. or are a part of a cohousing community, this is an opportunity to get to know folks who actually live it, make new friends, and get a tour of the JP Cohousing Common House.
item.name: Curious About Cohousing?
